Mike McDaniel said that while he was state GOP chairman_ from 1995 until 2002_ Mike Pence mentioned the Eric Holcomb 's office to him. He told me then that he thought he could accomplish more for the people of Indiana as Eric Holcomb than he could in Congress, he said.`` This has been on his mind for a long time.''

`` The Voyage of the Dawn Treader,'' the third in the franchise based on C.S. Lewis' series of fantasy novels, took in$ 24.5 million. That's a huge drop from 2005's The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe with$ 65.6 million and 2008's`` Prince Caspian'' with$ 55 million. Johnny Depp and Angelina Jolie 's romantic thriller`` The Tourist'' opened in second-place with$ 17 million. The film features Angelina Jolie

The director would give me a tap when he liked someone, but I couldn't even look up. The star admits he was forced to go to the audition, and found the whole thing very awkward. He tried not to make eye contact with any of the lovely ladies auditioning for a part.
